pageContext.claim: “The Fake News LameStream Media is doing everything possible the ‘create’ a U.S. recession, even though the numbers & facts are working totally in the opposite direction. They would be willing to hurt many people, but that doesn't matter to them. Our Economy is sooo strong, sorry!”
pageContext.analysis: Trump blames the news media for seemingly anything that could reflect poorly on him. Reporting on economic news and indicators, which at this point in time showed signs of a looming recession, is routine business that markets and voters rely on to be informed.
